https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qk9wsF4Zpwu4q2Eib72fKow119h.jpg In this new video essay, filmmaker Alexandre O. Philippe delves into the dread-inducing mood and tone of Kiyoshi Kurosawa’s modern horror classic Cure, deploying a dizzying range of cinematic references to unravel the film’s eerie magic. (There Is No) Cure
